body: Pin, I haven't used CASE plugins. For which simulation are you using Honeybee? The good news is that you can use Honeybee in Dynamo to run daylight analysis quite soon and eventually the energy simulations. [](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2915573/14061951/9601e14c-f364-11e5-89bb-d6fcfb75eb9d.png)
